name: meowmasher
description: The clicker game all about cats

scripts.build-exe-windows: python -m PyInstaller main.py --name MeowMasher --add-data index.html;. --add-data package.json;. --add-data src;src --icon favicon.ico --windowed --distpath dist/windows
scripts.build-exe-unix: python3 -m PyInstaller main.py --name MeowMasher --add-data index.html:. --add-data package.json:. --add-data src:src --icon favicon.ico --windowed --distpath dist/unix
scripts.build-exe-both: npm run build-exe-windows && npm run build-exe-unix
